content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment, Ryanah. The apartment is a great option and I believe it will suit your needs well. However, I would like to clarify a few things before we proceed with the rental agreement. Could you please let me know your preferred rental length and whether you would like to include utilities in the rental price? Additionally, do you have any specific requirements or preferences for the apartment that you would like to discuss?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I prefer 1 year rental. And I would like to include utilities in the rental price. I am a student and I don't have a stable income, so I want to make sure that my expenses are as low as possible. I also want to have a good relationship with my landlord, so I am willing to negotiate for a good price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
I understand your concerns, Ryanah. A one-year rental agreement with utilities included is certainly possible, and I am willing to work with you to find a fair and reasonable rental price that suits both of our needs.

Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would like to propose a rental price of 700 Euros per month. This includes all utilities and other expenses related to the apartment, such as maintenance and repairs. I believe this price is fair and competitive in the Mannheim area, and it will allow you to have a comfortable living space while keeping your expenses low.

Of course, I am open to discussing this price further and negotiating if necessary. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns, and we can work together to find a rental agreement that works for both of us.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 700 Euros per month. I am happy with the price and I am willing to sign the rental agreement. Thank you for your understanding and flexibility. I am looking forward to moving into the apartment.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Great to hear that you agree to the rental price, Ryanah. I am glad that we were able to come to an agreement that works for both of us.

Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns about the rental process or the apartment itself. I am happy to help and ensure that your move into the apartment is as smooth and stress-free as possible.

Thank you for choosing to rent from me, and I look forward to having you as my tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
